articles.content: Gold prices fell sharply in India today, tracking weakness in global rates. On MCX, gold fell 0.7% to near two-month low of 51,186. At day's low, gold fell to 51,086. Silver edged 0.2% lower to 64,82… [+2320 chars]

articles.title: Buy Wipro; target of Rs 670: Emkay Global Financial - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Wipro has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 670 in its research report dated April 26, 2022.
articles.content:
